title: Lanita Regular (Latin and true cyrillic)
content:
Hi there! I’m currently working on this typeface, named Lanita (in old bulgarian - "cheek"). So, here is my attempt for: regular letters (capital and small), old style numbers, latin ligatures and plucky try for cyrillic ligatures. I really want to know your opinion about them. Also, and for this typeface at all. Each comment will be valuable!

[Lanita Latin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417143956/http:/ipopov.net/vector/wip_lanita_1.jpg)

[Lanita Cyrillic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417143956/http:/ipopov.net/vector/wip_lanita_2.jpg)
author: ipopo

comments.content: First glance - looks pretty good and usable. I'll have to look at it over a longer period of time before I can add anything else. I guess that means there's nothing bad standing out yet to me. :-) Hopefully you'll get some others to comment soon.
